CODE COMPARATIVE TABLE 2004 CODE
This table gives the location within this Code of those sections of the 2004 Code, which are included herein. Sections of the 2004 Code, as supplemented, not listed herein have been omitted as repealed, superseded, obsolete or not of a general and permanent nature. For the location of ordinances adopted subsequent thereto, see the table immediately following this table.
EXPAND
2004 Code

this Code
